item.description:
Event is on Rain or Shine! Bring a chair and umbrella (just incase).

Relax, sit back and enjoy some bluegrass music by Southern Rail. Visit JAAS snack shack to purchase a cider donut or a carmel apple, savor the smells of our barbecue provided by our chef from our restaurant J's. We invite you to take a tour of the winery or simply taste many of our award winning wines. This festival highlights the hand crafted micro-brewed beers of our brewer Thomas Knight. So relax, put down your blanket and enjoy the music.

http://www.nashobawin...

About this Meetup Group

Meeting Location Details:
I will not be there til later. We will be joining two or more other meetup groups.

Kirk is the event organizer from Mass Blues and Brews. He is expecting to meet our group along with the other two at 12 noon on the front porch of The Wine Shoppe.

If you arrive later, look for him and the meetup sign on a table on the grass area.
Kirk will also be wearing a meetup button and maybe a Red Sox cap.
Cyndi will be there too from the NH Seacoast meetup group and may have balloons.
item.name: Nashoba Valley Winery Bluegrass & Brews Festival
